column4: Hello i am using evolution an it use 2 save a copy of the sent e-mail on the server but it stopped doing so...anyone know how to fix it?
Hello i am using evolution an it use 2 save a copy of the sent e-mail on the server but it stopped doing so...anyone know how to fix it?\
Hello i am using evolution an it use 2 save a copy of the sent e-mail on the server but it stopped doing so...anyone know how to fix it?
Hello i am using evolution an it use 2 save a copy of the sent e-mail on the server but it stopped doing so...anyone know how to fix it?
check it is an IMAP folder
its IMAP not POP3...it use 2 save a copy on the server but it stoped doing so...I would like it to do so..so when I am not at desktop an sign into mail online I can view sent folder
there should be a tickbox with save sent on server iirc
I am using evolution  an there is no check box for save sent on server
hm, if you're sending through correct smtp, it should work
it will send the e-mail but it wont save it to the online sent folder...
that is not evolution's fault then
check your webmail settings, there might be something
i will look again but I had checked over that like 3 times now give me a few to check
if evolution sends the mails through SMTP and it gets delivered, it is for evolution to decide whether the copy gets saved
where would I find the setting that would save the copy online?
probably at your webmail, as the webmail clients are usually on the actual server
